CustomField.description: * Live : Open contracts * Expired : Closed and no more data to be received * Suspended : legally suspended due to a breach of contract
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
* Live : Open contracts * Expired : Closed and no more data to be received * Suspended : legally suspended due to a breach of contract
Only suppliers with status of 'Live' will be shown on the website.
CustomField.label: Status
